name: My Huggable Koala
greetingText: Roses are #FF0000, violets are #0000FF — happy Valentine’s from an Engineer!
wishText: Idk how to describe it, but with u I find myself in peace and calm. Whenever u hold my hand or hug my arm, all noise turn off. Trust me when I say that I hope things work out in sync, and we can share more experiences together Ms. Jarre Ibáñez. Would u like to be my Valentines
